Name: Add vendor references to Events
DoD: Event has vendorRefs[] + role; editor UI; API returns; renders on event page

Name: Add vendor references to Locations
DoD: Location has vendorRefs[] + featuredVendorRef; UI+API; renders on location page

Name: Business CTAs on Event page
DoD: Order + Promo CTAs visible when data exists; logs cta_click with eventId+vendorId

Name: Business CTAs on Location page
DoD: Featured vendor + Top dishes widgets wired; logs cta_click with locationId+vendorId

Name: Create campaign from event
DoD: Button creates campaign draft with eventId, vendor list, schedule skeleton, tracking tags

Name: Generate post drafts from campaign
DoD: Creates 3 drafts (pre/during/post) and assigns vendors

Name: Attach products to post
DoD: Select vendor → fetch products → attach productRefs[]; shoppable module renders

Name: Tracking events (minimum analytics)
DoD: Logs event_view, location_view, cta_click, post_view, order_click with sourceContext

Name: Canva OAuth connect
DoD: Connect Canva account; store tokens securely; revoke supported

Name: Edit in Canva + export to Studio
DoD: Create design → open Canva → export job → asset saved in media library

Name: Template system v1
DoD: Admin maps template IDs per post type; Studio uses mapping

Name: Product catalog v1
DoD: CRUD products; availability; ordering link; EU currency support

Name: Bundles: Event specials
DoD: Bundle entity; attach to posts; render bundle card

Name: Sponsored placements
DoD: Admin marks sponsored; placement rules; disclosure badge

Name: Post-event recap automation
DoD: Event end triggers recap template in Studio; vendor slots assigned

Name: Billing hooks + plan gating
DoD: Checkout; subscription status stored; gated features enforced

Name: Collections & bookmarking
DoD: Save event/place/vendor/post; collections; saved lists; boosts feed

Name: Follow vendors/creators
DoD: Follow/unfollow; feed shows followed first

Name: Veo 3.1 promo clip generation
DoD: Generate clip; save to media library; attach to post

Name: KPI dashboard v1
DoD: Shows views, clicks, conversion by event/location/vendor
